title: For the record - George Best: a profile
brief_description: A profile of George Best (interviewed by Michael Parkinson), his origins in Belfast, family background, and his “pop-star” status as a gifted footballer. Includes football footage and interviews with family friends and club representatives. Emphasises the competing elements in his life, his status as a footballer versus his celebrity status.
